name: Create a new user based on body request

testSteps.description:
Given I have new users to create
| user | email | subscription |
| User | myUser1@test.com | true |
| User2 | myUser2@test.com | false |
| User3 | myUser3@test.com | true |
When I create a new user using POST request body string "{\"user\": \"User\", \"email\": \"userfromjson@test.com\", \"subscription\": \"true\"}"

children.description: I send a POST query to {string} with header {string} and body {string}

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Server: Cowboy
Connection: keep-alive
X-Powered-By: Express
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET,PUT,POST,DELETE,OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: X-Requested-With,Content-Type,Cache-Control,access_token
Content-Type: application/json
Content-Length: 79
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Date: Wed, 09 Feb 2022 23:39:38 GMT
Via: 1.1 vegur

testSteps.description: Then I get the response code equals to 201

title: Create a new user based on body request
